After using S24 for 4 days am writing this reviewoverall a good compact and a handy phone if youwant a beast camera, clean UI, battery backup isslightly less but it's okay for average use if you wanta mobile for daily gaming than the battery backupwillbe lesser.lf you want good handy Samsungphone than go for itREAD MORE

The Samsung Galaxy S24 delivers a strong all-round camera performance, particularly in daylight. Its 50 MP main sensor captures sharp, detailed, and vibrant images with natural colors, while the ultrawide and selfie cameras perform well for landscapes and portraits, offering consistent color and exposure across lenses.READ MORE
